description:
🔥Learn the secrets of "How to Meow on the Long Tail with Cheshire Cat AI" at the #Py4AI conference with Piero Savastano - Founder of Cheshire Cat AI. Join a captivating journey into leveraging AI for navigating the long tail. 

"LLMs are not enough. Let's see how to build a long tail AI agent, customized for your niche and totally under your control. A few words on how the framework (one of the biggest in Europe) was born and how the community and its values are growing."

#CheshireCatAI #AI #techtalks #LLM #aiagents #aicommunity #Py4AI #techconference
title: How to Meow on the Long Tail with Cheshire Cat AI
